title: Bee
summaries: The Bee is a small flying enemy that usually appears in the Underground Jungle. They can be spawned by the Queen Bee, and will also appear when destroying Bee Hives and occasionally when mining Hive blocks (which are mainly found in Bee Hive biomes). They attack by flying into their target, dealing contact damage. In Expert Mode(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions), Bees will inflict the Poisoned debuff to players for 2–6 / 2.5–7.5 seconds.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, Bees can also damage other enemies. Bees can select all enemies (except themselves and the <linked>Queen Bee</linked>) and the player as target, and they always attack the nearest target. Bees' attacks deal 100% contact damage to the target, and they will also take 100% contact damage from the target.
